content: Do we have the list of servers we can try connecting? asking this from the Cross Organization Application access track

Vivek said:

Do we have the list of servers we can try connecting? asking this from the Cross Organization Application access track

There is a list of test servers here: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/FHIR/Test+Servers

HI All,

Aetna will be bringing our Patient Access API to Connectathon 26. If you are interested in connecting your app, please register for the Aetna Developer Sandbox API using the following portal before Jan 12th Noon ET link: https://developerportal.aetna.com/gettingstarted and follow the instructions for:
1. Register as a Developer for Aetna’s APIs
AND
2. Subscribing to Aetna API’s

We will be supporting the Patient and Coverage CARIN profiles. See the following page for details: https://developerportal.aetna.com/fhirapis Please send any questions on registration to AetnaInteroperabilityProductionAccess@aetna.com. Note: Your use of the Aetna Interoperability API Developer Portal, including access to the Developer Sandbox and the APIs, is subject to the Aetna Interoperability API Developer Portal Terms and Conditions of Use and Privacy Policy. We highly recommend third-party app developers adhere to industry best practices similar to those outlined in the CARIN Code of Conduct.

@Sandra Vance is there any chance you could add us to the test server confluence page?
